title: Riot dose not care about it's player base, prove me wrong.
body: Riot is a company that consistently does things that its player base is against, removing certain things, nerfing champions or items that no one wants nerfed, buffing champions that have no right being buffed, failing to punish toxic or otherwise negatively behaving players, and causing general harm to the experience to the good player who spends time trying to enjoy this game that was once great. Prove me wrong if you can.
